condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: National guidelines for ECD 0-3 and 3-6 years developed and tested to inform nationwide adoption and implementation by government.

description.narrative: UNICEF continued to support the Government's efforts in developing guidelines for ECD 0-3 and 3-6. Policy recommendations on family education support for infants and yound children under the age of 3 has been submitted by ACWF. In collaboration with MOE, Public Service Announcements for National ECD Advocacy Month were developed and delivered nationwide. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/07/2020

title.narrative: Kindergarten (KG) services quality assessment guidelines and KG teachers

target.value: 2020:KG quality assessment guidelines and KG teachers

actual.value: 2019:KG teachers' competence assessment tools was completed and submitted to MOE for approval. Resources developed for assessment tools/guidelines have been used for related UNICEF-supported projects in 2019, such as KG teacher training standards and ECE programme supervision guidelines.
